content: Most people don’t make big decisions at all, truth be told. Most people let the big decision ‘happen to them’ as if that were possible! Not choosing is always a decision to let things stay the same, not to let things take their proper course. The touchstone I use is this. Even with multiple choices. Intuitive choosing doesn’t require an either/or. Does this option bring me further into my connection with the Infinite, more into the wonder, or take me further away from it? Be radically self-honest. If further, why would you consider that option? You are an inspiration!
